name: Heliventure FTO
about: At Heliventure FTO, we are dedicated to providing top-notch helicopter pilot training, fostering a community of passionate and determined individuals. Our programs, including private pilot, instrument, commercial pilot, and certified flight instructor courses, are designed to meet FAA standards and prepare students for a wide range of career opportunities. With a focus on safety, our IS-BAO Stage 3 rating and ACCSC accreditation ensure high academic and safety standards. Our financing options and global reputation, including a 99% job placement rate, make us a leader in helicopter pilot education. Located in the diverse Columbia River Gorge, our flight environment offers unique skill-building challenges. We are committed to helping you achieve your dream of flight with exceptional training and career support. Join us to embark on a journey of passion and determination.
services:
["HELICOPTER PILOT TRAINING
VIP HELICOPTER TRANSFERS
Training helicopter pilot PPL(H) - Private Pilot
CPL(H) pilot training - Commercial Pilot
